name: Gregorio Refinery

verification.notes: Corrected from conflated record. Original 'Gregoria' was misspelling of Gregorio Refinery. Removed incorrect aliases (Faride, El Bronce) which are separate facilities. ENAP operates Gregorio Refinery for crude oil processing in Magallanes region.

province: Magallanes y de la Antartica Chilena

correction_notes.issue: Record conflated oil refinery with two unrelated gold mines
correction_notes.resolution: Corrected to Gregorio Refinery (ENAP oil facility). Faride mine created as separate facility. El Bronce already exists as chl-el-bronce-mine-fac.json

web_search_companies.notes: ENAP (Empresa Nacional del Petróleo) is Chile's state-owned oil company. Gregorio Refinery is one of three ENAP refineries along with Aconcagua and Bío Bío.
